metadata.title: External API Integration for Research Sources
metadata.description: Add external source provider infrastructure to ModelChorus, enabling automatic discovery and fetching of research papers from Semantic Scholar, arXiv, and web search APIs
objectives: Enable automatic source discovery for research workflows
Integrate Semantic Scholar API for academic papers (200M+ papers)
Support web search APIs (Brave, DuckDuckGo, Google Custom Search)
Maintain backward compatibility with manual source ingestion
Follow existing ModelChorus patterns (async, retry, registry, pydantic)
Provide comprehensive error handling, rate limiting, and timeout management
success_criteria: Users can run 'modelchorus research --auto-discover' to fetch sources
Integration tests with mocked HTTP achieve >80% coverage
Documentation includes setup guides and examples

spec-root.title: External API Integration for Research Sources

metadata.purpose: Create base abstractions, models, and registry for source providers

metadata.description: Create sources package initialization with public exports
Abstract base class for all source providers with async interface

task-1-2-1.title: Define SourceProvider abstract class with search() and fetch_content() methods

task-1-2-2.title: Define Pydantic models: SourceResult, SourceContent, SearchParams

task-1-2-3.title: Implement retry logic with exponential backoff (following CLIProvider pattern)

task-1-2-4.title: Add timeout handling and error classification

metadata.description: Registry for source providers following WorkflowRegistry pattern

task-1-3-1.title: Create SourceProviderRegistry class with register/get/list methods

metadata.description: HTTP client utilities using httpx for async requests

task-1-4-1.title: Create async HTTP client wrapper with timeout and retry support

metadata.description: Configuration management for source providers

task-1-5-1.title: Define source provider configs (API keys, rate limits, timeouts) with env var loading

metadata.description: Update config package exports to include sources
Add optional dependencies: beautifulsoup4, pypdf (if needed for HTML/PDF parsing)

verify-1-1.title: SourceProvider abstract class can be imported and has required methods

metadata.command: python -c "from modelchorus.providers.sources import SourceProvider; assert hasattr(SourceProvider, 'search')"
metadata.expected: Import succeeds and abstract methods exist

verify-1-2.title: SourceProviderRegistry can register and retrieve providers

metadata.command: python -c "from modelchorus.providers.sources import SourceProviderRegistry; assert hasattr(SourceProviderRegistry, 'register')"
metadata.expected: Registry pattern works correctly

metadata.command: python -c "from modelchorus.providers.sources import SourceResult; s = SourceResult(source_id='test', title='Test', url='http://test.com', source_type='paper'); assert s.source_id == 'test'"
metadata.expected: Models instantiate and validate

metadata.purpose: Implement Semantic Scholar provider as first concrete implementation

metadata.description: Semantic Scholar API provider implementation

task-2-1-3.title: Implement fetch_content() for paper metadata, abstracts, citations, references

metadata.description: Export SemanticScholarProvider

metadata.expected: Provider instantiates successfully

verify-2-2.title: Search returns properly formatted SourceResult objects

metadata.expected: Search results have correct structure with title, url, metadata
Multiple rapid requests don't exceed rate limits

task-3-1-4.title: Add rate limiting (1 req/3sec) and register with @SourceProviderRegistry.register('arxiv')
